description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Some entrances/exits of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station closed
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站部分出入口暫時關閉

2025-08-02T10:09:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that due to adverse weather conditions, Entrance/Exit C at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is closed for preventive purpose. Please use other entrances/exits. 
High Speed Rail train service remains normal.
2025-08-02T10:09:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於天氣情況惡劣，香港西九龍站C出入口暫時關閉以作預防措施，請使用其他出入口。
高速鐵路服務維持正常。

2025-08-02T12:40:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Entrance/Exit C of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is reopened.
2025-08-02T12:40:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 香港西九龍站C出入口重新開放。

2025-08-02T10:18:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that heavy rain is expected and preventative flooding measures are in place. The following entrances/exits are temporarily closed. 
For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm.
2025-08-02T10:18:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於預料會有大雨，以下車站出入口暫時關閉以便作防護措施。
詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm。

2025-08-02T10:40:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that heavy rain is expected and preventative flooding measures are in place. The following entrances/exits are temporarily closed. 
For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm
Please use other entrances/exits.
2025-08-02T10:40:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於預料會有大雨，以下車站出入口暫時關閉以便作防護措施。
詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm
請使用其他出入口。

2025-08-02T12:14:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that the entrances/exits closed earlier have resumed normal.
2025-08-02T12:14:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，較早前已關閉的出入口已回復正常。

2025-08-02T10:20:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to inclement weather , the following ferry service(s) will be or have been suspended. 
The last sailing is:
Coral Sea Ferry Service Company Limited
Kwun Tong to Sai Wan Ho: 10:18
Sai Wan Ho to Kwun Tong: 10:33
Sam Ka Tsuen to Sai Wan Ho: 10:30
Sai Wan Ho to Sam Ka Tsuen: 10:15.
2025-08-02T10:20:00.CONTENT_CN:
因惡劣天氣，以下渡輪服務將會或已經暫停服務。
尾班船如下：
珊瑚海船務有限公司
觀塘往西灣河:10:18
西灣河往觀塘:10:33
三家村往西灣河:10:30
西灣河往三家村:10:15。

2025-08-02T12:09:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to inclement weather, the following ferry/ kaito ferry services will be or have been suspended. 
Tsui Wa Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited
Between Aberdeen and Po Toi Island: Service suspended
Between Stanley and Po Toi Island: Service suspended
Between Wong Shek and Tap Mun: Service suspended
Between Ma Liu Shui and Tap Mun: Service delayed
Between Sai Kung and Kau Sai Village/ High Island: Sailing at 11:30 from Sai Kung suspended.  At the same time, the following ferry/ kaito ferry services will be or have been resumed:
Coral Sea Ferry Service Company Limited
Resumed at:
Kwun Tong to Sai Wan Ho: 12:18
Sai Wan Ho to Kwun Tong: 12:33
Sam Ka Tsuen to Sai Wan Ho: 12:00
Sai Wan Ho to Sam Ka Tsuen: 12:15
Sam Ka Tsuen to Tsim Sha Tsui and Central: 12:15
Central and Tsim Sha Tsui to Sam Ka Tsuen: 13:05.
2025-08-02T12:09:00.CONTENT_CN:
因惡劣天氣，以下渡輪/街渡渡輪服務將會或已經暫停服務。
翠華船務(⾹港)有限公司
⾹港仔⾄蒲台島:暫停服務
赤柱⾄蒲台島:暫停服務
黃石至塔門:暫停服務
馬料水至塔門:服務延誤
西貢至滘西村及糧船灣:11:30西貢開出的航班暫停服務。  同時，以下渡輪/街渡渡輪服務將會或已經恢復服務。
珊瑚海船務有限公司
復航時間如下:
觀塘往西灣河:12:18
西灣河往觀塘:12:33
三家村往西灣河:12:00
西灣河往三家村:12:15
三家村往尖沙咀及中環:12:15
中環及尖沙咀往三家村:13:05。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park Now Full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-08-02T11:45:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-08-02T11:45:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-08-02T22:48:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-08-02T22:48:00.CONTENT_CN: ⿈⾊暴⾬警告信號現已⽣效，天⾬路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛⼈⼠及乘客須: i.提早計劃⾏程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出⾨； iii.⼩⼼駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路⼝。

2025-08-03T09:30:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to rough sea condition, the following ferry/kaito ferry services will be or have been adjusted. 
Tsui Wah Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited
Po Toi Island - Aberdeen/Stanley:
- Between Stanley to Po Toi island: Suspended
- Departing from Po Toi Island at 6:00pm to Aberdeen will not stop at Stanley.
2025-08-03T09:30:00.CONTENT_CN:
因受海⾯⾵浪影響，以下渡輪/街渡渡輪服務將會或已經調整服務。
翠華船務（⾹港）有限公司
蒲台島-⾹港仔/⾚柱:
-⾚柱來往蒲台島航班:暫停服務
-蒲台島於下午6時正開出前往⾹港仔的航班將不停泊赤柱。

2025-08-05T02:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-08-05T02:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。
